blogPost.excerpt: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
blogPost.body: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
blogPost.title: CALIPIO Screen Recorder - Free and secure screen recorder
blogPost.author: Daniel Modler

localize.description: 记录你的屏幕和网络摄像头。无需安装。受端到端加密保护。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免费使用。
localize.tagline: 免费和安全的屏幕记录器

localize.description: 記錄你的屏幕和網絡攝像頭。無需安裝。受端到端加密保護。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免費使用。
localize.tagline: 免費和安全的屏幕記錄器

previous.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
previous.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。

next.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
next.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果
